de.fhb.sailboat.gui
Class MainControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
  de.fhb.sailboat.gui.MainControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MainController
public class MainControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MainController

This class manages the data pipe between GUI (logic), model and the boat (world model/ planner).

Author:
Patrick Rutter

commitPrimitiveCommand

public void commitPrimitiveCommand(Planner planner,
                                   java.lang.Integer propellor,
                                   java.lang.Integer rudder,
                                   java.lang.Integer sail)
Commits a special manual command to either sail, rudder or propellor actor. Used primary by remoteDialog for remote control.

Specified by:
commitPrimitiveCommand in interface MainController
Parameters:
planner - planner reference used for commiting
propellor - new value for propellor, may be null
rudder - new value for rudder, may be null
sail - new value for sail, may be null
